snp1.4:5.3: Na kho pana mayaṃ → na kho pana samaṇa (sya-all), balībadde → balivadde (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | balibaddhe (sya-all, csp1ed)
snp1.4:16.2: sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati → saṃdhūmāyati sampadhumāyati (cck) | saṃdhūmāyati sampadhūmāyati (sya1ed, sya2ed)
snp1.4:16.3: divasaṃ santatto → divasasantatto (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
snp1.4:18.6: Aññataro ca → aññataro ca kho (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | aññataro kho (sya-all, km, mr)
